creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: small rectangular structure with domed roof; exterior fully glazed in green except finial which appears red; three decorated exterior walls each broken into nine areas with scrolling decorations in each area; fourth wall open, hollow; four holes on two sides next to open side; rectangular hole on bottom
portfolio: From From a large tileworks retinue
title: Palanquin
